Detailed Description

template<class V, class W>
class htgs::TaskScheduler< V, W >

Encapsulates an ITask to interact with an ITask's functionality.

The TaskScheduler interacts with the BaseTaskSchedulerRuntimeThread to process an ITask's input and output data. The core logic of a TaskScheduler is implemented with the ITask representing the computational and logic functionality.

When the TaskScheduler is ready to be terminated the thread associated with the TaskScheduler and the output Connector will be notified. Using this approach each ITask that is terminated if the input Connector has finished producing data will be closed.

Template Parameters
Tthe input data type for the TaskScheduler, T must derive from IData.
Uthe output data type for the TaskScheduler, U must derive from IData.
Note
This class should only be called by the HTGS API
#define PROFILE to enable profiling.

numPipelinesthe number of pipelines

void htgs::TaskScheduler< V, W >::addPipelineConnector ( int  pipelineId)
inlinevirtual

Adds the input Connector for this TaskScheduler to the pipeline connector list.

Each Connector added represents one of the other Connectors that is attached to a copy of this TaskScheduler that is within the same ExecutionPipeline.

Parameters
pipelineIdthe pipeline Id

template<class V, class W>
void htgs::TaskScheduler< V, W >::executeTask ( )
inlinevirtual

Executes the TaskScheduler.

Using the following procedure: 0. If the ITask is a start task, then send ITask::executeTask with nullptr and set that it is no longer a startTask

  1. Checks if the ITask::isTerminated, if it is then reduce thread pool count for the runtime and wakeup any tasks waiting on this TaskScheduler's input queue. If the thread pool count is zero, then indicate that this task is no longer producing data and wakup all consumers waiting on the output connector. Also indicate this task is no longer releasing memory and wakeup all memory managers that this task is releasing memory to.
  2. Get input from input Connector. (optional polls for data, if timeout period expires, then will recheck if the ITask is terminated and try to get input again)
  3. If the data is not nullptr, then sends the data to the ITask::executeTask function.
Note
#define PROFILE to enable profiling.

Reimplemented from htgs::BaseTaskScheduler.
